revised_title: Navigational Challenges and Magnetic Variations in the Pacific Ocean
tldr: This article discusses the variations in the magnetic compass observed by Captain Rogers during his voyage from California to Guam in the Pacific Ocean. The author provides a table of the compass variations and makes inferences about the patterns of magnetic variation in the region. The findings could help in understanding the navigational challenges faced during sea voyages and contribute to the study of geomagnetism.
